item.title: How many profiles do Free users use?
item.author: julianwinternheimer@gmail.com (Julian Winternheimer)
item.description: Introduction There is a big focus on simplifying the product for Buffer users on free plans in 2017 in order to create a more intuitive experience and encourage more upgrades. The purpose of this analysis is to get a better understanding of how users currently interact with the free plan, in order to better inform decisions around future plan limits. Specifically, we would love to learn about how many profiles users connect and actually schedule updates for.
